author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
A report from Windows Central details Microsoft's next-gen Xbox plans, and they include not only a new console, but two handhelds, one of which is due later this year. Microsoft has yet to comment on the report, but some of the details do line up with what Xbox's Phil Spencer said at IGN Live last year, that the company won't have its own handheld ready for at least a couple of years. In other news, Naughty Dog's Neil Druckmann spoke with filmmaker Alex Garland about the upcoming sci-fi game Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet, and how religion plays a big role in the game's story. And finally, images and video from a new Battlefield playtest have leaked onto reddit, and EA doesn't seem to mind?
title: Next-Gen Xbox Plans Reportedly Detailed - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Meet Rebel (voiced by Amanda Hufford) in this Date Everything! trailer for the upcoming sandbox dating simulator set in the comfort of your own home, featuring 100 fully voice-acted datable characters. Let the romance flow between your bed, smoke alarm and… Overwhelming Sense of Existential Dread? Are you ready to Date Everything? 

Date Everything will be available on PC, Xbox Series X/S, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Nintendo Switch in June 2025.

#DateEverything #Gaming #Games
title: Date Everything! - Official Rebel Trailer

author: IGN
description: Devil May Cry premieres April 3, only on Netflix. From Capcom, led by Adi Shankar, and animated by Studio Mir comes Devil May Cry - a Netflix animated series based on the hit video game franchise.
title: Devil May Cry - Official Trailer (2025) Johnny Yong Bosch, Adi Shankar

author: IGN
description:
Watch the unsettling Animas announcement trailer for this upcoming first-person psychological horror game set in a haunting house in the Venezuelan mountains. In Animas, you must explore this house across multiple time periods to reconstruct the dark history of the Blanco family, discovering how the past has left an indelible mark on the house and its inhabitants. Animas will be available on Steam in 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Animas - Official Announce Trailer

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Legends Trailer for MLB The Show 25, the latest installment in the baseball simulation franchise developed by Sony San Diego. The legends of baseball are all a part of MLB The Show 25 so players can assemble the ultimate dream team including Ted Williams, Derek Jeter, Tony Gwynn, Ken Griffey Jr, and more. MLB The Show 25 is launching on March 18 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch.
title: MLB The Show 25 - Official Legends Trailer

author: IGN
title: Anthony Russo talks how they focus on characters in an ensemble movie! #theelectricstate #avengers

author: IGN
description:
In "The Studio," Seth Rogen stars as Matt Remick, the newly appointed head of embattled Continental Studios. As movies struggle to stay alive and relevant, Matt and his core team of infighting executives battle their own insecurities as they wrangle narcissistic artists and craven corporate overlords in the ever-elusive pursuit of making great films. With their power suits masking their neverending sense of panic, every party, set visit, casting decision, marketing meeting, and award show presents them with an opportunity for glittering success or career-ending catastrophe. As someone who eats, sleeps, and breathes movies, it's the job Matt's been pursuing his whole life, and it may very well destroy him.

#IGN #TV
title: The Studio - Official Trailer (2025) Seth Rogen, Catherine O’Hara, Kathryn Hahn | Apple TV+

author: IGN
description:
The Humble Games Showcase 2025 debuts on March 12th! We’re thrilled to unveil two never-before-seen world premieres, share updates on the most anticipated Humble titles, and help our amazing third-party friends like Akupara Games and Alwar drop exclusive news during our pre-show countdown. Don’t miss out!

#IGN #Gaming
title: Humble Games Showcase 2025 | World Premieres, Exclusive Trailers, and More!

author: IGN
description: Watch the Kickstarter Teaser Trailer for Hopetown, a psychological RPG in development by Longdue Games comprised of former Disco Elysium developers. Hopetown is set in a mining town caught between decay and transformation as players embody the role of a rogue journalist. Poke at bruises, pull at loose threads, and make sense of a mystery in need of a conclusion. Hopetown is coming soon with a Kickstarter launching on March 17.
title: Hopetown - Official Kickstarter Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Steel, shadow, or sheer force—three warriors, three paths, one journey. Will you stand as the realm’s shield like a Knight, strike with deadly precision like an Assassin, or let your enemies learn to fear the North like a Sellsword? Choose your fate. 

The latest Game of Thrones: Kingsroad trailer introduces you to the three classes available in the upcoming action-adventure RPG. The Knight, Sellsword, and Assassin classes are inspired by iconic roles featured in the Game of Thrones series. In Game of Thrones: Kingsroad, experience a brand-new story as you take on the role of a new character, who, through a quirk of fate, becomes the heir to House Tyre, a small noble house in the North. 

Game of Thrones: Kingsroad will be available in 2025 on PC via Steam or through Windows Launcher, as well as on iOS and Android devices.
title: Game of Thrones: Kingsroad - Official Class Introduction Trailer

author: IGN
title: Split Fiction video game references! (Spoilers!) Which one is your favorite? (PART 2) #splitfiction

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Space Engineers 2 Alpha vertical slice 1.1 update trailer for the action strategy simulation game developed by Keen Software House. Players can now access a plethora of new features with the Vertical Slice 1.1 Update bringing access to the UGC Workshop, featuring full Steam Workshop integration allowing for Blueprints and Worlds to be easily shared and discovered. Changes and improvements to the gameplay experience are also incorporated into the Vertical Slice 1.1 Update for Space Engineers 2 Alpha, available now for PC (Steam).

#SpaceEngineers2 #Gaming #Games
title: Space Engineers 2 Alpha - Official Vertical Slice 1.1 Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss 'The Breach' Game Overview Showcase 2 for No Rest for the Wicked, an action RPG developed by Moon Studios. Players are tasked with embodying a holy warrior with remarkable powers and abilities to cleanse the land of wickedness and shape the kingdom’s fate. The upcoming update titled The Breach will give players new content, features, and improvements for players to enjoy. Watch the latest Wicked Inside Showcase to get more information and gameplay on The Breach Update for No Rest for the Wicked, launching on April 30 for PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: No Rest for the Wicked - Official 'The Breach' Game Overview | Wicked Inside Showcase 2

author: IGN
title: This was one of the only PG scenes from the finale that @PrimeVideo would let us post. #invincible

author: IGN
description:
Long Sword is a popular weapon choice in Monster Hunter, featuring flashy combos and an emphasis on devastating counter-attacks. It's a weapon that's easy to pick up and play with and comes with a lot of nuance that makes it hard to master, making it great for beginners and veterans alike. If you're looking to learn the way of the blade, look no further! We'll cover the basics and some advanced tactics for this huge weapon in Monster Hunter Wilds.

00:00 Intro
00:34 The Basics
04:48 Starting Combos and Moves
06:49 Advanced Tactics
08:53 Longsword Gear
10:34 Where to Find More Tips

For more tips on Monster Hunter Wilds, check out our in-depth Wiki guide at https://www.ign.com/wikis/monster-hunter-wilds

#IGN #Gaming #MonsterHunterWilds
title: Monster Hunter Wilds: Long Sword Guide

author: IGN
description:
Steel Hunters gets a new trailer and an early access release date reveal. Check out the latest Steel Hunters trailer for the upcoming free-to-play mech hero shooter that blends Battle Royale and Extraction mechanics. Steel Hunters launches into Early Access on PC on April 2, 2025.

In Steel Hunters, players take command of formidable mechanical giants called Hunters, engaging in dynamic duo PvPvE battles on the Hunting Grounds. Fight to collect Starfall on an abandoned Earth and use combat tactics to turn rivals into scrap.

#SteelHunters #Gaming #Games
title: Steel Hunters - Official Early Access Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Steel Seed gameplay trailer for the stealth third-person action game developed by Storm in a Teacup. Players will embody Zoe and a trusty drone Koby on an adventure across a sci-fi world set for oblivion. Survive the dangers that lie in an underground facility and uncover secrets to save humanity. Steel Seed is launching on April 10 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#SteelSeed #Gaming #Games
title: Steel Seed - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out this exclusive "First Look" featurette of the upcoming film The Amateur starring Rami Malek and Laurence Fishburne. Join stars Rami Malek, Laurence Fishburne, Rachel Brosnahan, and director James Hawes for a behind-the-scenes look at the upcoming espionage thriller movie before it opens in theaters nationwide on April 11, 2025.

Charlie Heller (Malek) is a brilliant, but deeply introverted decoder for the CIA working out of a basement office at headquarters in Langley whose life is turned upside down when his wife is killed in a London terrorist attack. When his supervisors refuse to take action, he takes matters into his own hands, embarking on a dangerous trek across the globe to track down those responsible, his intelligence serving as the ultimate weapon for eluding his pursuers and achieving his revenge. 

The film also stars Caitríona Balfe, Jon Bernthal, Michael Stuhlbarg, Holt McCallany, Julianne Nicholson, Adrian Martinez, and Danny Sapani. The screenplay is by Ken
title: The Amateur - Exclusive 'First Look' Behind the Scenes (2025) Rami Malek, Laurence Fishburne

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Alien: The Roleplaying Game Kickstarter release date trailer for the tabletop RPG developed by Free League Publishing and 20th Century Studios. Players will be able to interact with this Alien experience with updated core rules including new artwork, new content, and a variety of new tools to claim victory. Alien: The Roleplaying Game will have a Kickstarter launching on March 25.

#Alien #Tabletop #Gaming
title: Alien: The Roleplaying Game - Official Kickstarter Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Here's a fresh look at gameplay in this latest creepy Slender: The Arrival VR trailer for the upcoming VR port of Slender: The Arrival. Slender: The Arrival VR will be available on Meta Quest 2, 3, 3s & Pro, PS VR2, PC VR in spring 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Slender: The Arrival VR - Official Gameplay Trailer | VR Games Showcase March 2025

author: IGN
description: Watch the creepy Out of Sight reveal trailer for this upcoming horror game from The Gang and Starbreeze, which is getting a full Flat2VR port. The Out of Sight trailer gives a peek at puzzles to solve and the terrifying threats you'll encounter. Out of Sight VR is coming soon to PS VR2 and Meta Quest. Out of Sight is coming to Steam, Epic Games Store, Xbox Series X/S, and PS5 (PlayStation 5).
title: Out of Sight VR - Official Reveal Trailer | VR Games Showcase March 2025

author: IGN
description:
Become the ultimate HITMAN in VR. Check out gameplay from Hitman: World of Assassination in this trailer for the upcoming VR stealth game. Hitman: World of Assassination will be available on PS VR2 on March 27, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Hitman: World of Assassination - Official PS VR2 Gameplay Trailer | VR Games Showcase March 2025

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at this Atomfall gameplay showcase for the upcoming first-person action RPG developed by Rebellion. Players will be able to explore a wide array of locations within the world of Atomfall with one being the Casterfell Woods, an eerie and mysterious location for players to experience. Don't miss this extended look at the Casterfell Woods section as an experienced player navigates the dangers of the quarantine zone, shows off the combat of Atomfall, and more. Aromfall is launching on March 27 for Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Xbox Game Pass, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store) with a release on PlayStation 4 (PS4) and PlayStation 5 (PS5) at a later date.

#Atomfall #Gaming #Games
title: Atomfall - Official Casterfell Woods Gameplay Showcase

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Getaway Limited Time Mode Trailer for Fortnite, the hit third-person action battle royale game developed by Epic Games. Players can now access the Getaway Limited Time Mode within Chapter 6 Season 2 tasking players to attain one of four Crystal Llamas and extract them in a Getaway Van. Victory lies with eliminating all other teams or being the first three teams to reach the van. The Getaway Limited Time Mode is available now for Fortnite.

#GetawayLimitedTimeMode #Fortnite #Gaming
title: Fortnite - Official Getaway Limited Time Mode Trailer

author: IGN
description:
“To me, there is no greater pleasure than to feel the warmth of my fists drenched in blood.” Those fiendish words are spoken by the brutal supervillain Conquest – voiced by The Walking Dead’s Jeffrey Dean Morgan – in IGN’s exclusive clip from the Season 3 finale of Invincible, which streams on Prime Video on Thursday, March 13. 

The battle-scarred Conquest first appeared in the season's penultimate episode, which saw the alternate universe Invincibles invade Earth. Conquest is the especially powerful enforcer the Viltrum Empire sends to force protagonist Mark Grayson’s (voiced by Steven Yeun) to complete his mission of prepping Earth for takeover.
title: Invincible Season 3 Finale - Exclusive Clip (2025) Steven Yeun, Jeffrey Dean Morgan

author: IGN
description:
ZA/UM Studio, the studio behind Disco Elysium, reveals their next game, codenamed Project [C4]. Check out the Project teaser trailer for your first look at the new espionage RPG that blends player introspection, deep character-driven dialogue, and high-stakes encounters steered by dice rolls. 

The world of is rife with shadowy characters who help move the pieces for competing geopolitical powers in a game of concealed conflict. The player sets out to complete a desperate assignment which will put them at risk of losing their life, or much worse – being exposed for what they really are.

As an Operant serving a questionable global power, the player finds themselves locked in a vicious, clandestine struggle for truth and influence. Yet it is the mind that takes centre stage in Project . More vulnerable and more powerful than the physical world, it can be erased, changed, reordered, and of course significantly altered through regular use of psychoactive substances amongst other means.
title: Project [C4] - Official Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Mufasa: The Lion King Disney+ release date trailer for the live-action addition to The Lion King franchise distributed by Walt Disney Pictures streaming on Disney Plus on March 26.

The film stars Aaron Pierre (Mufasa), Kelvin Harrison Jr. (Taka/Scar), Tiffany Boone (Sarabi), Kagiso Lediga (Young Rafiki), Preston Nyman (Zazu), Mads Mikkelsen (Kiros), Thandiwe Newton (Eshe), Lennie James (Obasi), Anika Noni Rose (Afia), Keith David (Masego), John Kani (Rafiki), Seth Rogen (Pumbaa), Billy Eichner (Timon), Donald Glover (Simba), Blue Ivy Carter (Kiara), Braelyn Rankins (Young Mufasa), Theo Somolu (Young Taka), Folake Olowofoyeku, Joanna Jones, Thuso Mbedu, Sheila Atim, Abdul Salis, Dominique Jennings, and Beyoncé Knowles-Carter (Nala). 

Exploring the unlikely rise of the beloved king of the Pride Lands, “Mufasa: The Lion King” enlists Rafiki to relay the legend of Mufasa to young lion cub Kiara, daughter of Simba and Nala, with Timon and Pumbaa lending their signature schtick
title: Mufasa: The Lion King - Official Disney+ Release Date Trailer (2025) Donald Glover, Mads Mikkelsen

author: IGN
description:
Welcome back to IGN Game Scoop!, the ONLY video game podcast! This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Sam Claiborn, Justin Davis, and Mark Medina - dive into Split Fiction, a game that refuses to be tied to a single genre. From action to RPG mechanics and beyond, this ambitious title blends elements in unexpected ways. Does it pull it off, or is it too much of a mixed bag? Join us as we break down our first impressions and discuss what makes Split Fiction stand out.

For more on Split Ficiton and more gaming news, make sure to check out IGN's Game Scoop! on IGN.com and youtube.com/igngames
title: Split Fiction: No Genre Is Safe!  - Game Scoop! Clips

author: IGN
description:
Mission… Termination. Destination… NetherRealm. Initiating startup… Check out the latest Mortal Kombat 1: Khaos Reigns gameplay trailer to see T-1000 in action. T-1000 will be available for early access players on March 18. Full access will be available on March 25, 2025.

#MortalKombat1 #T1000 #Gaming
title: Mortal Kombat 1: Khaos Reigns - Official T-1000 Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description: Get your first look at Firefighting Simulator: Ignite, the new Unreal Engine 5-powered simulation game that puts you in the boots of a firefighter, rescuing trapped citizens, battling electrical blazes, handling flammable liquids, grease fires, backdrafts, flashovers, and explosions. You can team up in four-player co-op as well. Firefighting Simulator: Ignite is due out in Fall 2025 for PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1669480/
title: Firefighting Simulator: Ignite – Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Fortnite x Shohei Ohtani trailer. Just in time for the beginning of the MLB season, Shohei Ohtani has joined the Fortnite Icon Series. To celebrate Shohei Ohtani's debut, the Week 4 quests (dropping on March 18 and lasting until Chapter 6 Season 2 ends) will be all about baseball and Shohei's historic 50/50 season!

Check out the Fortnite Shop from March 17 for the Shohei Ohtani Outfit, Samurai Shohei Outfit, Decoy and Samurai Screamer Back Blings, and Trusty Two-Way and Baseball Batana Pickaxes.

#Fortnite #Baseball #Gaming
title: Fortnite x Shohei Ohtani - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest Rise of the Ronin trailer, announcing that the open-world action RPG is out now on PC via Steam. It's also already available on PS5 (PlayStation 5).

Set in Japan in 1863, after three centuries of the Tokugawa Shogunate’s reign, the Black Ships of the West descend upon the nation’s borders and the country falls into a state of turmoil. Embark on a historic journey where a masterless warrior, known as a Ronin, must fight to forge their own destiny through the chaos of war and political unrest. 

Rise of the Ronin arrives on PC with lots of new features including ultra-wide monitor compatibility, 8K resolution, 120 FPS, 3D audio, and more.

#RiseOfTheRonin #Gaming #Games
title: Rise of the Ronin - Official PC Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Catch up on the Star Wars: Andor story so far ahead of the release of Andor Season 2 for a reminder of what's happened in the Star Wars TV show. Andor stars Diego Luna, Stellan Skarsgård, Genevieve O’Reilly, Denise Gough, Kyle Soller, Adria Arjona, Faye Marsay, Varada Sethu, Elizabeth Dulau, Alan Tudyk, with Ben Mendelsohn and Forest Whitaker.

Andor Season 2 begins streaming on Disney+ on April 22, 2025. All episodes of Andor Season 1 are available to steam now on Disney Plus, as well as Hulu until April 22.

#StarWars #Andor #TV
title: Andor: Season 2 - Official Season 1 Recap (2025) Diego Luna, Ben Mendelsohn
